page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on our Hosted Private Cloud offer has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 11/07/2025 06:19 UTC End time : 11/07/2025 06:39 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some hosted VMs were temporarily unavailable. Also, management of other VMs was temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access, use and manage their VMs. Customers that had their VMs down, can now relaunch them and use to verify their partition with "fsck". If after the verification the partition is corrupted, customers can ask for a restoration. Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
